name: Local Search HQ
overview:
In the world we live in today, people go to search engines instead of the Yellow Pages to look for products and services in their area. In fact, 80% of retail transactions happen within 15 miles of where customers live, highlighting the importance of local businesses in today’s economy. If you’re looking to grow and increase the bottom-line of your business, local search engine marketing is key and Local Search HQ is the company that will make it happen.

Local Search HQ, based in Tustin, California, has a proven track record of success for over seven years. Our services include local search marketing, local business listing, local search SEO, social media optimization, online reputation management market scope analysis, mobile marketing and more. With experience helping all types of businesses with their local Internet marketing campaigns, there is no business that we can’t help get to the top of search engine results rankings.

We are proud to have designed our own unique search engine management platform. This enables us to offer our program for as low as $300 monthly while providing a positive return on investment for your business. Local Search HQ can also manage cloud-sourcing for a minimal cost, allowing you to grow your business without having to invest in large infrastructure costs. We are ready to handle all of your local search engine marketing needs. For more information visit our website at http://www.searchlocalhq.com/.
